description: Finds the largest element in an integer array
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: LargestInArray.c
Compile: gcc LargestInArray.c -o LargestInArray
Run: ./LargestInArray

description: Finds the smallest element in an integer array
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: SmallestInArray.c
Compile: gcc SmallestInArray.c -o SmallestInArray
Run: ./SmallestInArray

description: Calculates sum of elements of an array
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: SumArray.c
Compile: gcc SumArray.c -o SumArray
Run: ./SumArray

description: Prints elements of an array in reverse order
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: ReverseArray.c
Compile: gcc ReverseArray.c -o ReverseArray
Run: ./ReverseArray

description: Sorts an array using bubble sort algorithm
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: BubbleSort.c
Compile: gcc BubbleSort.c -o BubbleSort
Run: ./BubbleSort

description: Searches an element using linear search
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: LinearSearch.c
Compile: gcc LinearSearch.c -o LinearSearch
Run: ./LinearSearch

description: Searches an element using binary search in sorted array
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: BinarySearch.c
Compile: gcc BinarySearch.c -o BinarySearch
Run: ./BinarySearch

description: Checks whether a string is palindrome
instruction:

program_name: Count Vowels and Consonants in String

instruction:
